description:
Planet Blupi (known as Planet Eggbert too) is a strategy and adventure game. It subtly blends action with thought-provoking challenges. Behind the quiet and gentle facade, you'll enjoy a fascinating diversion full of surprises.


https://www.blupi.org
> AppImage is for Linux (x86-64)
> DMG is for macOS (macOS >= 10.13, x86-64 and >= 11, ARM64)
> EXE is for Windows (x86-64)
The -dev tarball is the full dist source archive for building the game.
ChangeLog v1.15.1
- Bug Fix notarization problem with macOS and the previous release
- New Change the soundfont for the music (90s dos/win style)
- New Build for Apple M1/M2/M3/...
AppImage signature
The AppImage can be verified with the AppImage.pub.asc public key.
